createconnection.name: CreateConnection
createconnection.description: Grants permission to create a Connection resource

createhost.name: CreateHost
createhost.description: Grants permission to create a host resource

createrepositorylink.name: CreateRepositoryLink
createrepositorylink.description: Grants permission to create a repository link

createsyncconfiguration.name: CreateSyncConfiguration
createsyncconfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a template sync config

deleteconnection.name: DeleteConnection
deleteconnection.description: Grants permission to delete a Connection resource

deletehost.name: DeleteHost
deletehost.description: Grants permission to delete a host resource

deleterepositorylink.name: DeleteRepositoryLink
deleterepositorylink.description: Grants permission to delete a repository link

deletesyncconfiguration.name: DeleteSyncConfiguration
deletesyncconfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete a sync configuration

getconnection.name: GetConnection
getconnection.description: Grants permission to get details about a Connection resource

getconnectiontoken.name: GetConnectionToken
getconnectiontoken.description: Grants permission to get a Connection token to call provider actions

gethost.name: GetHost
gethost.description: Grants permission to get details about a host resource

getindividualaccesstoken.name: GetIndividualAccessToken
getindividualaccesstoken.description: Grants permission to associate a third party, such as a Bitbucket App installation, with a Connection

getinstallationurl.name: GetInstallationUrl
getinstallationurl.description: Grants permission to associate a third party, such as a Bitbucket App installation, with a Connection

getrepositorylink.name: GetRepositoryLink
getrepositorylink.description: Grants permission to describe a repository link

getrepositorysyncstatus.name: GetRepositorySyncStatus
getrepositorysyncstatus.description: Grants permission to get the latest sync status for a repository

getresourcesyncstatus.name: GetResourceSyncStatus
getresourcesyncstatus.description: Grants permission to get the latest sync status for a resource (cfn stack or other resources)

getsyncblockersummary.name: GetSyncBlockerSummary
getsyncblockersummary.description: Grants permission to describe service sync blockers on a resource (cfn stack or other resources)

getsyncconfiguration.name: GetSyncConfiguration
getsyncconfiguration.description: Grants permission to describe a sync configuration

listconnections.name: ListConnections
listconnections.description: Grants permission to list Connection resources

listhosts.name: ListHosts
listhosts.description: Grants permission to list host resources

listinstallationtargets.name: ListInstallationTargets
listinstallationtargets.description: Grants permission to associate a third party, such as a Bitbucket App installation, with a Connection

listrepositorylinks.name: ListRepositoryLinks
listrepositorylinks.description: Grants permission to list repository links

listrepositorysyncdefinitions.name: ListRepositorySyncDefinitions
listrepositorysyncdefinitions.description: Grants permission to list repository sync definitions

listsyncconfigurations.name: ListSyncConfigurations
listsyncconfigurations.description: Grants permission to list sync configurations for a repository link

listtagsforresource.name: ListTagsForResource
listtagsforresource.description: Grants permission to the set of key-value pairs that are used to manage the resource

passconnection.name: PassConnection
passconnection.description: Grants permission to pass a Connection resource to an AWS service that accepts a Connection ARN as input, such as codepipeline:CreatePipeline

passrepository.name: PassRepository
passrepository.description: Grants permission to pass a repository link resource to an AWS service that accepts a RepositoryLinkId as input, such as codestar-connections:CreateSyncConfiguration

registerappcode.name: RegisterAppCode
registerappcode.description: Grants permission to associate a third party server, such as a GitHub Enterprise Server instance, with a Host

startappregistrationhandshake.name: StartAppRegistrationHandshake
startappregistrationhandshake.description: Grants permission to associate a third party server, such as a GitHub Enterprise Server instance, with a Host

startoauthhandshake.name: StartOAuthHandshake
startoauthhandshake.description: Grants permission to associate a third party, such as a Bitbucket App installation, with a Connection

tagresource.name: TagResource
tagresource.description: Grants permission to add or modify the tags of the given resource

untagresource.name: UntagResource
untagresource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an AWS resource

updateconnectioninstallation.name: UpdateConnectionInstallation
updateconnectioninstallation.description: Grants permission to update a Connection resource with an installation of the CodeStar Connections App

updatehost.name: UpdateHost
updatehost.description: Grants permission to update a host resource

updaterepositorylink.name: UpdateRepositoryLink
updaterepositorylink.description: Grants permission to update a repository link

updatesyncblocker.name: UpdateSyncBlocker
updatesyncblocker.description: Grants permission to update a sync blocker for a resource (cfn stack or other resources)

updatesyncconfiguration.name: UpdateSyncConfiguration
updatesyncconfiguration.description: Grants permission to update a sync configuration

useconnection.name: UseConnection
useconnection.description: Grants permission to use a Connection resource to call provider actions
